S.FORM: Rick Adelman 1 bulad 16 demiad, 1946 a mihca, Rick Adelman, miunduay. Donald L. Adamse nalecuhan i Lynwood, California, nanu syubay kanas mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput. Rick Adelman i 1968 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 7 ku uwac atu silsil 79, namapili' tu nu San Diego Rockets putiput. namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan Lists of National Basketball Association players
